name: DimbleWhit the wizard
description:
DimbleWhit is a wizard... well sort-of. he can use magic but isn't very good at it, so when a man tells him he can learn magic spells in a "abandoned" dungeon, he takes the opportunity. However things aren't as easy as the man said, there is a dark magical force lurking with a crazy cult and devil worshippers in this dungeon! fight through enemies, demons, ogres and a powerful dark wizard to prove your not a Dimwit! and unlock spells along the way

(very early development) this beta was made in 1 day!
